imdb.plot outline: No place on earth has arrested the attention of adventurers and archaeologists like the Holy Land. But does what we dig up in Israel, bear resemblance to the stories that we read of Jesus in the Gospels? To answer this question Archaeology & Jesus follows two paths. You'll explore the process of archaeology with the top experts digging in Israel today. And along the way, you'll join New Testament scholar, Dr. Craig Evans, as he reveals ground breaking finds that illuminate the life, death and resurrection of Jesus.
imdb.title: Archaeology and Jesus
plot: No place on earth has arrested the attention of adventurers and archaeologists like the Holy Land.
